document.heading: License to Carry a Pistol Amendment Act of 2014

history.narrative: Law 20-279, the “License to Carry a Pistol Amendment Act of 2014,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 20-930. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on December 2, 2014, and December 17, 2014, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on February 6, 2015, it was assigned Act No. 20-621 and transmitted to Congress for its review. D.C. Law 20-279 became effective June 16, 2015.
